QuestData.Title: The "Earth-Slasher" Master Plow
QuestData.Description: <The box art depicts a pandaren farmer of impossible physique standing proudly astride a widening rift in the earth, a mighty plow in his grasp. Cubs wrestle playfully on his shoulders and dangle from his muscular arms.$B$BAt his side, a stoic female - of equally impossible physique - balances a massive, overflowing cornucopia gracefully on her head while kicking a virmen in the face.>$B$B"The Earth-Slasher. Master the land. Master your life."
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the "Earth-Slasher" Master Plow to Farmer Yoon at Sunsong Ranch or Halfhill Market.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the "Earth-Slasher" Master Plow to Farmer Yoon at Sunsong Ranch or Halfhill Market.
